entry.title: So Wrong...So Right
entry.summary:
Author: ReggietheChickenWhisperer

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,945Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 16

Summary: Rewritten starting at the competition scene with Tommy and Buck.Buck stands up for himself and Eddie against Tommy. Even though Buck has come a long way, he still struggles when he's alone, even more so once he breaks up with Tommy for a second time and is left alone in Eddie's house. But, even though standing up against Tommy felt so right, something will go so horribly wrong.Eddie is in Texas, has been for months. He finally has Chris again, which feels so right. But something is missing, something is wrong. He's stuck working as an Uber and seeing all his friends and family in LA through a phone screen.What will it take for things to finally be right for Buck and Eddie again?

entry.title: It's Christmas and we are all in misery
entry.summary:
Author: sassay

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,130Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 51

Summary: Buck turns to Eddie, ‚ÄúMaybe we should do a dinner together and our parents might tear each other apart?‚Äù ‚ÄúOr they'll team up and destroy all of us instead,‚Äù Eddie deadpans. ‚ÄúOk, Mr Pessimist,‚Äù Buck snarks back. ‚ÄúI mean, we would outnumber them at least?‚Äù suggests Chim. ‚ÄúTrue,‚Äù Eddie considers this for a moment, ‚ÄúMight as well all go down together.‚Äù ‚ÄúThat's the spirit,‚Äù Buck claps Eddie's shoulder. Christmas time means family events, unfortunately this year both the Buckley and Diaz parents are visiting. To try and lessen their impact a joint dinner has been suggested. It goes about as well as you would expect. When blood family doesn't support you, you can count on your found family to be your staunchest defenders. Eddie and Buck figure out some things after they defend each other. PROMPT FILL 7 - FAMILY EVENTS

entry.title: Polaris
entry.summary:
Author: Loves_BuckleyDiaz

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,139Chapters: 2/3Kudos: 25

Summary: Although appearing to the naked eye as a single point of light, Polaris is a triple star system, in which the closer companion star is extremely close to the main star. Buck was only 18 when his whole life changed for the better. He ran away from home with the love of his life, had twins‚Äì a boy and a girl, and made a life for himself that he thought he would never get. Until his high school sweetheart dies of cancer, leaving Buck to pack up his things, along with the twins, and move to LA. Little did he know that the move would impact their lives forever.

entry.title: Brothers and Sons
entry.summary:
Author: MatildaVespasian

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,403Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 21

Summary: Buck thinks he sees Bobby's ghost at his funeral, he turns to check on Maddie a few rows behind, trying to avoid Tommy's eyes and there he is. Hair longer and face older, for a second he thinks he's imagining what Bobby would look like in his retirement, a few more years along, hair no longer regulation and graying. He glances back to Eddie in his suit beside him, a stark reminder he isn't really here anymore, not Buck's partner any longer. He wants to nudge his shoulder against his and ask if he sees him too. But he's too scared, if he doesn't then that means Buck's truly lost any semblance of his false composure. He keeps his head straight, spends Athena's eulogy holding himself together with a thread so thin and frayed it's barely holding him up. Buck finds himself sitting with Bobby's brother in the wake of the biggest loss of his life.

entry.title: S3 Superwoman: Last Responder
entry.summary:
Author: That_bitch_without_a_life

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 33,448Chapters: 9/14Kudos: 60

Summary: Buck could ring her hands over and over. it was bad enough that she got blown up by a fire truck. It was bad enough she'd spent 5 months under lock and key. She really does not need to be dealing with all this bullshit, whatever god looks after humanity is cruel. At least now she has somebody to lean on, at least now Eddie knows the truth and she'll be back on the team soon enough. TLDR: this is a female buck fic if she was supergirl, just trust the process.
